title: üìù Generic Form Guide
description: Demonstrates automatic field detection on any website form
affiliateDisclosure: This is an example guide showing generic form detection capabilities.

prerequisites.title: What You'll Need
prerequisites.description: Make sure you have these ready before starting:
items: Any website with a form (signup, contact, etc.)

steps.title: Auto-Detect Form Fields
steps.description: GuideFloat will automatically detect and guide you through any form fields
steps.instructions:
1. Navigate to any website with a form
2. GuideFloat will automatically detect all form fields
3. The blue dot will guide you through each field in logical order
4. Fields are detected by:
   ‚Ä¢ Autocomplete attributes
   ‚Ä¢ Name/ID patterns
   ‚Ä¢ Input types
   ‚Ä¢ Label text
   ‚Ä¢ Placeholder text

üí° Pro Tip: GuideFloat works on any website - no manual configuration needed!
üìù Note: The system intelligently orders fields (email ‚Üí name ‚Üí password ‚Üí submit)

spotlight.message: GuideFloat will automatically detect and guide you through form fields

steps.title: üéâ Generic Detection Complete!
steps.description: You've seen how GuideFloat works with any website's forms
steps.instructions:
1. GuideFloat automatically detected all form fields
2. It guided you through them in logical order
3. No manual configuration was needed
4. This works on any website!

üéâ Congratulations! You've seen how GuideFloat can work with any website's forms using intelligent field detection.

Key Features Demonstrated:
‚Ä¢ Automatic field type detection
‚Ä¢ Smart field ordering
‚Ä¢ Generic selector generation
‚Ä¢ Works with any website
